thread.title: Ground News - Greater Manchester veteran says D-Day was a 'doddle'
thread.title_full: Ground News - Greater Manchester veteran says D-Day was a 'doddle'

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Greater Manchester veteran says D-Day was a 'doddle'
text:
Summary by Ground News David Teacher served as a mechanic in an RAF Beach Unit on D-Day in 1944. His unit was among the first to land on Juno Beach in Normandy. Mr Teacher was awarded an MBE for his charitable work in 2012. He celebrated his 100th birthday at a care home in Greater Manchester. Share menu More
